TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CertificateFactory extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class defines the functionality of a certificate factory, which is used to generate certificate, certification path (CertPath) and certificate revocation list (CRL) objects from their encodings.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Java.Security.Cert.CertificateFactory GetInstance(string type) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetInstance (type As String) As CertificateFactory

Docs.param: the name of the requested certificate type. See the CertificateFactory section in the Java Cryptography Architecture Standard Algorithm Name Documentation for information about standard certificate types.
Docs.summary: Returns a certificate factory object that implements the specified certificate type.
Docs.returns: a certificate factory object for the specified type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified certificate type is not available at any installed provider.
